title: skin download
body: since i have played LOL for about nearly a month, i really into those artwork of champion skins, i wonder if there is a place i can download them from the website? i want to set them up as my desktop background.

replies.body: Go to GAME INFO on the tab above and go champions click on the champ scroll down and all wallpapers are there save/download and set as wallpaper :) have fun, mines currently SKT artwork they did not too long ago and been that since I've noticed it #SKTwin
Easiest way is to just google [Champion/skin] Splash art.
